msg.enter_decimal_value: Please enter the absolute value of a decimal number less than 1.
msg.question_reach_the_moon: How many times would you have to fold a piece of paper (thickness 0.1mm) for it to be thick enough to reach the moon (384,400 km)?

note.intoverflow: Integer overflow occurs if you enter a number greater than or equal to 63.
note.lossoftrailingdigits: Loss of trailing digits occurs if you enter 0.0000000000000001.

title.intoverflow: The Distance from Earth to the Moon

description.lossoftrailingdigits: Loss of trailing digits can occur.

description.all: Warning: Several links cause severe memory leaks or increase CPU usage rate. They can make your computer unstable. The results may change depending on JRE type / version, JVM option, OS, hardware (memory, CPU) or etc.
description.troubles: Memory leak, infinite loop, deadlock, and so on:
